project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Define the questions and answers in a structured variable
Implement the function to display questions and capture user input
Implement the final score display mechanism
Write tests for each of the implemented functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
